title: In game shop causes black screen
body: While I'm playing in game, when I click to enter the shop and decide what items I want, the screen goes black for a few seconds. I click an item and it goes black for a few more seconds. When I buy an item it goes black for a few seconds. And then randomly in lane it does the same thing when i click on champs.

replies.body: My friend had the same exact issue. He said he reset his Internet Explorer options to "default" and it fixed it. Some of the facets of league use some IE tech so that doesn't surprise me. I hope that fixes it.

Hmmmm it seems like those clicks are causing some weird interactions between your graphics hardware and League. Double check that you didn't possibly miss any driver updates, but also make sure to go through the other steps listed in this [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) just in case those drivers don't help much.

I tried the trouble shooting with no luck. I have another account and on that account, while using the same client and on the same PC, I don't have this issue.  On my smurf I can play just fine without the black screen appearing when I click into and buy items  from the in game store. I've tested it multiple times and its only an issue on my main account for some reason. I have also tired repairing at the log in screen and completely uninstalled and reinstalled to no avail.
